
## How to Encode and Decode Base64

base64 --decode winrm_enable_script.txt 
apollo@Apollos-MacBook-Pro files % ls -l
total 40
-rw-r--r--  1 apollo  staff  13989  9 Apr 19:43 virtual_machine_rapid7_insight_agent_config_zip.txt
-rw-r--r--  1 apollo  staff    809  9 Apr 19:43 winrm_enable_script.txt
apollo@Apollos-MacBook-Pro files % cat winrm_enable_script.txt | python3 -c "import sys; from urllib.parse import unquote; print(unquote(sys.stdin.read()));"
<thon3 -c "import sys; from urllib.parse import unquote; print(unquote(sys.stdin.read()));"


apollo@Apollos-MacBook-Pro files % echo '' | base64 -D
<ZgBpAGwAZQAgAC0ARgBvAHIAYwBlAE4AZQB3AFMAUwBMAEMAZQByAHQA' | base64 -D
apollo@Apollos-MacBook-Pro files % echo -n "girl power is here" | base64 
Z2lybCBwb3dlciBpcyBoZXJl
apollo@Apollos-MacBook-Pro files % echo "Z2lybCBwb3dlciBpcyBoZXJl" | base64 
WjJseWJDQndiM2RsY2lCcGN5Qm9aWEpsCg==
apollo@Apollos-MacBook-Pro files % echo "Z2lybCBwb3dlciBpcyBoZXJl" | base64 -D
